_header: Sustain abstain keep well in your mind
_description: Advice regarding abstenance and forbearance — five stanzas rhyme royal with refrain, ‘Amonges all other for the moste happy’ or ‘Of all other shalbe most happy’

OxfChrChAll.First Lines:
Sustine abstine kepe well in yowr myndeBeare and forbere haue euer
                    in remembrance…
OxfChrChAll.Last Lines:
…Beare forbeare and then schall ye trewlyeOff all lyuynge
                    creatures be the moste happye

BLHar5036.First Lines:
Sustein absteine kepe welle in your mindeBeare and fforbeare haue
                    euer in remembrance…
BLHar5036.Last Lines:
…Beare fforbeare an than shall ye treulyOff all lyuing
                    creature be the moste happy

Banna.First Lines:
Sustene Abstene keip weill in ȝowr myndbeir and forbeir haif
                    evir in remenbrance…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Beir and forbeir and than sall ȝe trewlieoff all leving
                    creaturis be most happie

TCD160.First Lines:
Sustayne abstayne kep well in your myndbarr and fforbeare haue euer
                    in Remembrance…
TCD160.Last Lines:
…betyr fforber and then shall ye trulyOf all other creators be
                    most hapye
